item.title: Talk: TWYP - An event driven architecture in a fast growing ecosystem
item.description:
I was asked to give a talk on Event Driven Architectures at Landelijk Architectuur Congres. This Dutch conference was hosted in ’s Hertogenbosch on November 17th-18th 2016.

The talk explains in more detail on how Twyp’s architecture is based on the reactive manifesto. During this presentation I am explaining how Twyp is architected and what we’ve learned in over two years of development.

Unfortunately the talk was not recorded. But you can find the slides on SlideShare.
